did.abstract: The Conrad Firestein Photographs contain one photographic print of the late photographer John Albok, shot circa 1982.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Conrad Firestein is an Amsterdam-based photographer whose portfolio documents fashion, beauty, lifestyles, and interiors from the late-20th century through the present. The subject of Firestein's collection, the late John Albok, was a celebrated tailor and photographer best known for his images of New York shot during the Great Depression.

processinfo.head: Processing Information Note
processinfo.p: The Conrad Firestein Photographs were rehoused in February 2013.

arrangement.head: Arrangement Note
arrangement.p: The Conrad Firestein Photographs were arranged by an archivist within a single folder.
